name: Imperial Palace
desc: The ultimate symbol of the imperial power, home of the Empress.

name: San-Iris Embassy
desc: An array of buildings spreading loyalty to the Empress and linking the planet to San-Iris.

name: Underwater Work
desc: Specialized manufacturing infrastructure placed underwater. Utilizes heavy pressure to ease the workload of certain components. Produces heavy industrial equipment, supplies, weapons and spaceworthy spaceships. Production quality can be improved by installing a nanoforge.
